trans-unit.source: Create a Transform or Map
trans-unit.target: Create a Transform or Map

trans-unit.source: You can define relationships between an input XML document, add <token>mapop</token>s to modify the data, and then output an XML document.
trans-unit.target: You can define relationships between an input XML document, add <token>mapop</token>s to modify the data, and then output an XML document.

trans-unit.source: A <token>transform</token> or map is part of the <token>af_integration</token> SDK template in <token>vsprvs</token>.
trans-unit.target: A <token>transform</token> or map is part of the <token>af_integration</token> SDK template in <token>vsprvs</token>.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Installing the Azure AppFabric September 2011 CTP</link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Installing the Azure AppFabric September 2011 CTP</link>.

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: In this topic:

trans-unit.source: Choose your Project type
trans-unit.target: Choose your Project type

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to create a new <token>transform</token>: Add a map to the <ui><token>msgflow_proj</token></ui> or create a new <ui>BizTalk Service Artifacts</ui> project.
trans-unit.target: There are two ways to create a new <token>transform</token>: Add a map to the <ui><token>msgflow_proj</token></ui> or create a new <ui>BizTalk Service Artifacts</ui> project.

trans-unit.source: When a map is added or created in the <legacyBold><token>msgflow_proj</token></legacyBold>, it’s part of the project and is meant to be used in the <token>one-way</token> or the <token>request_response</token>.
trans-unit.target: When a map is added or created in the <legacyBold><token>msgflow_proj</token></legacyBold>, it’s part of the project and is meant to be used in the <token>one-way</token> or the <token>request_response</token>.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <ui>BizTalk Service Artifacts</ui> project, you are creating a map independent of any other project.
trans-unit.target: When you create a <ui>BizTalk Service Artifacts</ui> project, you are creating a map independent of any other project.

trans-unit.source: When the <token>transform</token> is complete, it can be saved, added to a business to business agreement, or added to an existing <token>msgflow_proj</token>.
trans-unit.target: When the <token>transform</token> is complete, it can be saved, added to a business to business agreement, or added to an existing <token>msgflow_proj</token>.

trans-unit.source: Many developers prefer to keep their schemas in a central location.
trans-unit.target: Many developers prefer to keep their schemas in a central location.

trans-unit.source: In this situation, you can use <ui>BizTalk Service Artifacts</ui> project to store your schemas and your maps.
trans-unit.target: In this situation, you can use <ui>BizTalk Service Artifacts</ui> project to store your schemas and your maps.

trans-unit.source: Then, you save/backup one project and its resources.
trans-unit.target: Then, you save/backup one project and its resources.

trans-unit.source: When you need those schemas or maps, you can simply add them to other projects.
trans-unit.target: When you need those schemas or maps, you can simply add them to other projects.

trans-unit.source: Add a map to an existing BizTalk Services project
trans-unit.target: Add a map to an existing BizTalk Services project

trans-unit.source: Open <legacyBold><token>vsprvs</token></legacyBold> as Administrator and open your <token>msgflow_proj</token>.
trans-unit.target: Open <legacyBold><token>vsprvs</token></legacyBold> as Administrator and open your <token>msgflow_proj</token>.

trans-unit.source: In the <token>af_integration</token> project, go to <ui>Solution Explorer</ui>.
trans-unit.target: In the <token>af_integration</token> project, go to <ui>Solution Explorer</ui>.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the project, select <ui>Add</ui>, and select <ui>New Item</ui> or <ui>Existing Item</ui>.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the project, select <ui>Add</ui>, and select <ui>New Item</ui> or <ui>Existing Item</ui>.

trans-unit.source: Enter your map details and select <ui>Add</ui>.
trans-unit.target: Enter your map details and select <ui>Add</ui>.

trans-unit.source: After you’re done creating the map, you can add the map to the Transform Stage of the <token>xml_bridge</token>.
trans-unit.target: After you’re done creating the map, you can add the map to the Transform Stage of the <token>xml_bridge</token>.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="45edc54c-7910-46dd-bc35-7e954dd1cf94" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create an XML Bridge</link> or <link xlink:href="7e5fedb4-9ab1-4470-aa8a-204633391da7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">XML Request-Reply Bridge : Configuring the Enrich Stage for the Response Message</link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="45edc54c-7910-46dd-bc35-7e954dd1cf94" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create an XML Bridge</link> or <link xlink:href="7e5fedb4-9ab1-4470-aa8a-204633391da7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">XML Request-Reply Bridge : Configuring the Enrich Stage for the Response Message</link>.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="3e49765d-97e5-407e-9d9c-698060c0249e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Uses and Stages of Bridges</link> provides more information on the Transform Stage.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="3e49765d-97e5-407e-9d9c-698060c0249e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Uses and Stages of Bridges</link> provides more information on the Transform Stage.

trans-unit.source: Create a new BizTalk Service Artifacts project
trans-unit.target: Create a new BizTalk Service Artifacts project

trans-unit.source: Open <legacyBold><token>vsprvs</token></legacyBold> as Administrator.
trans-unit.target: Open <legacyBold><token>vsprvs</token></legacyBold> as Administrator.

trans-unit.source: Select <legacyBold>New Project</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: Select <legacyBold>New Project</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: Expand the <legacyBold><token>csprcs</token></legacyBold> template and select <legacyBold>BizTalk Services</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: Expand the <legacyBold><token>csprcs</token></legacyBold> template and select <legacyBold>BizTalk Services</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: Select <legacyBold>BizTalk Service Artifacts</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: Select <legacyBold>BizTalk Service Artifacts</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: Enter the project <legacyBold>Name</legacyBold>, project <legacyBold>Location</legacyBold>, <legacyBold>Solution name</legacyBold> properties, and <legacyBold>Create directory for solution</legacyBold> preference.
trans-unit.target: Enter the project <legacyBold>Name</legacyBold>, project <legacyBold>Location</legacyBold>, <legacyBold>Solution name</legacyBold> properties, and <legacyBold>Create directory for solution</legacyBold> preference.

trans-unit.source: Select <legacyBold>OK</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: Select <legacyBold>OK</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: When the project is opened, Map.trfm, Schema1.xsd, and Schema2.xsd are created automatically.
trans-unit.target: When the project is opened, Map.trfm, Schema1.xsd, and Schema2.xsd are created automatically.

trans-unit.source: These files are blank so you can change them, delete them, or add your own.
trans-unit.target: These files are blank so you can change them, delete them, or add your own.

trans-unit.source: <token>af_integration</token> <token>transform</token>s have a .trfm extension and opening a .trfm file opens the <token>transform</token> designer where you can add schemas, add <token>mapop</token>s, and draw your links.
trans-unit.target: <token>af_integration</token> <token>transform</token>s have a .trfm extension and opening a .trfm file opens the <token>transform</token> designer where you can add schemas, add <token>mapop</token>s, and draw your links.

trans-unit.source: Add your Schemas
trans-unit.target: Add your Schemas

trans-unit.source: You can create and modify schemas using the built-in Schema Editor.
trans-unit.target: You can create and modify schemas using the built-in Schema Editor.

trans-unit.source: After the map is added, add your Source schema (input) and Target schema (output):
trans-unit.target: After the map is added, add your Source schema (input) and Target schema (output):

trans-unit.source: Open a <embeddedLabel><token>af_integration</token></embeddedLabel> or <ui>BizTalk Service Artifacts</ui> project in <token>vsprvs</token> as Administrator.
trans-unit.target: Open a <embeddedLabel><token>af_integration</token></embeddedLabel> or <ui>BizTalk Service Artifacts</ui> project in <token>vsprvs</token> as Administrator.

trans-unit.source: Add an existing schema (.xsd) or add a new schema (.xsd) to the project:
trans-unit.target: Add an existing schema (.xsd) or add a new schema (.xsd) to the project:

trans-unit.source: Right-click the project and select <ui>Add</ui>.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the project and select <ui>Add</ui>.

trans-unit.source: Select <ui>Existing Item</ui> to add a schema that is already created.
trans-unit.target: Select <ui>Existing Item</ui> to add a schema that is already created.

trans-unit.source: Select <ui>New Item</ui>, <ui>Schema</ui> to create a new schema.
trans-unit.target: Select <ui>New Item</ui>, <ui>Schema</ui> to create a new schema.

trans-unit.source: Select <ui>Add</ui>.
trans-unit.target: Select <ui>Add</ui>.

trans-unit.source: Double-click the schema (.xsd) to open the Schema Editor.
trans-unit.target: Double-click the schema (.xsd) to open the Schema Editor.

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>Developing EDI Schemas</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=248181</linkUri></externalLink> provides information on creating and modifying existing schemas.
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>Developing EDI Schemas</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=248181</linkUri></externalLink> provides information on creating and modifying existing schemas.

trans-unit.source: Add your map operations
trans-unit.target: Add your map operations

trans-unit.source: After the schemas are added, you can use the built-in <token>mapop</token>s to change or manipulate the incoming data to match the output schema:
trans-unit.target: After the schemas are added, you can use the built-in <token>mapop</token>s to change or manipulate the incoming data to match the output schema:

trans-unit.source: From the Toolbox, click and drag the <token>mapop</token> to the <token>transform</token> designer:
trans-unit.target: From the Toolbox, click and drag the <token>mapop</token> to the <token>transform</token> designer:

trans-unit.source: Double-click the <token>mapop</token> to configure the inputs.
trans-unit.target: Double-click the <token>mapop</token> to configure the inputs.

trans-unit.source: Click and drag items from your input schema to the map operations or output schema to create the links.
trans-unit.target: Click and drag items from your input schema to the map operations or output schema to create the links.

trans-unit.source: <token>mapop</token>s support three input source types:
trans-unit.target: <token>mapop</token>s support three input source types:

trans-unit.source: Link from a tree node
trans-unit.target: Link from a tree node

trans-unit.source: Link from a <token>mapop</token>
trans-unit.target: Link from a <token>mapop</token>

trans-unit.source: Constant value
trans-unit.target: Constant value

trans-unit.source: If a link from a tree node or a <token>mapop</token> is not allowed, a message stating the reason is displayed in the Status Bar.
trans-unit.target: If a link from a tree node or a <token>mapop</token> is not allowed, a message stating the reason is displayed in the Status Bar.

trans-unit.source: Some <token>mapop</token>s have a <legacyBold>Type</legacyBold> property in the <legacyBold>Configure</legacyBold> dialog window.
trans-unit.target: Some <token>mapop</token>s have a <legacyBold>Type</legacyBold> property in the <legacyBold>Configure</legacyBold> dialog window.

trans-unit.source: This <legacyBold>Type</legacyBold> property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: This <legacyBold>Type</legacyBold> property is read-only.

trans-unit.source: Design Area Tips and Tricks
trans-unit.target: Design Area Tips and Tricks

trans-unit.source: Cut, Copy & Paste
trans-unit.target: Cut, Copy & Paste

trans-unit.source: <token>mapop</token>s are movable using Cut/Copy and Paste.
trans-unit.target: <token>mapop</token>s are movable using Cut/Copy and Paste.

trans-unit.source: Links are not movable using Cut/Copy and Paste.
trans-unit.target: Links are not movable using Cut/Copy and Paste.

trans-unit.source: If you move a <token>mapop</token> using Cut/Copy and Paste, the links are removed.
trans-unit.target: If you move a <token>mapop</token> using Cut/Copy and Paste, the links are removed.

trans-unit.source: <token>mapop</token>s and links cannot be dragged and dropped.
trans-unit.target: <token>mapop</token>s and links cannot be dragged and dropped.

trans-unit.source: To move <token>mapop</token>s and their links, use <legacyBold>Ctrl + Click</legacyBold> to select the items to move.
trans-unit.target: To move <token>mapop</token>s and their links, use <legacyBold>Ctrl + Click</legacyBold> to select the items to move.

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>Ctrl + Click</legacyBold> cuts the items and then you paste to the desired location.
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>Ctrl + Click</legacyBold> cuts the items and then you paste to the desired location.

trans-unit.source: XSLT Support
trans-unit.target: XSLT Support

trans-unit.source: In a <embeddedLabel><token>af_integration</token></embeddedLabel> or <ui>BizTalk Service Artifacts</ui> project, a <token>transform</token> (.trfm) file can use XSLT.
trans-unit.target: In a <embeddedLabel><token>af_integration</token></embeddedLabel> or <ui>BizTalk Service Artifacts</ui> project, a <token>transform</token> (.trfm) file can use XSLT.

trans-unit.source: XSLT options include entering XSLT syntax and importing exiting XSLT files, including XML extension files (EXT XML).
trans-unit.target: XSLT options include entering XSLT syntax and importing exiting XSLT files, including XML extension files (EXT XML).

trans-unit.source: To import an existing XSLT file, select the <token>transform</token> design area.
trans-unit.target: To import an existing XSLT file, select the <token>transform</token> design area.

trans-unit.source: In Properties, select <ui>Import XSLT</ui>.
trans-unit.target: In Properties, select <ui>Import XSLT</ui>.

trans-unit.source: You can select a file or directly enter XSLT syntax.
trans-unit.target: You can select a file or directly enter XSLT syntax.

trans-unit.source: To import an existing XML extension file, select the <token>transform</token> design area.
trans-unit.target: To import an existing XML extension file, select the <token>transform</token> design area.

trans-unit.source: In Properties, select <ui>Import EXTXML</ui>.
trans-unit.target: In Properties, select <ui>Import EXTXML</ui>.

trans-unit.source: You can select a file or directly enter XML syntax.
trans-unit.target: You can select a file or directly enter XML syntax.

trans-unit.source: Select <ui>Use XslCompiledTransform for better performance</ui> to transform XML data by compiling XSLT style sheets and executing XSLT <token>transform</token>s.
trans-unit.target: Select <ui>Use XslCompiledTransform for better performance</ui> to transform XML data by compiling XSLT style sheets and executing XSLT <token>transform</token>s.

trans-unit.source: When the style sheet is compiled, it can be cached and reused.
trans-unit.target: When the style sheet is compiled, it can be cached and reused.

trans-unit.source: When this option is not enabled, the XslTransform class is used; which is best when a <token>transform</token> executes once.
trans-unit.target: When this option is not enabled, the XslTransform class is used; which is best when a <token>transform</token> executes once.

trans-unit.source: Direct Links with Repeating Records
trans-unit.target: Direct Links with Repeating Records

trans-unit.source: When linking a repeating record in the source document to a repeating record in the target document, a MapEach Loop is needed.
trans-unit.target: When linking a repeating record in the source document to a repeating record in the target document, a MapEach Loop is needed.

trans-unit.source: Creating these links from each source node to the target node is often time consuming.
trans-unit.target: Creating these links from each source node to the target node is often time consuming.

trans-unit.source: As a result, <token>af_integration</token> includes Direct Link functionality.
trans-unit.target: As a result, <token>af_integration</token> includes Direct Link functionality.

trans-unit.source: Direct Linking is simply copying from an input node to an output node, with no other processing.
trans-unit.target: Direct Linking is simply copying from an input node to an output node, with no other processing.

trans-unit.source: Direct Linking is also used when linking non-repeating records; which does not require a MapEach Loop.
trans-unit.target: Direct Linking is also used when linking non-repeating records; which does not require a MapEach Loop.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="42b6bb45-6c49-466a-aed6-88811f0e40a1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Loop Operations</link> describes the Direct Link functionality.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="42b6bb45-6c49-466a-aed6-88811f0e40a1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Loop Operations</link> describes the Direct Link functionality.

trans-unit.source: Scrolling
trans-unit.target: Scrolling

trans-unit.source: Scrolling vertically in the <token>transform</token> Designer can be done in two ways:
trans-unit.target: Scrolling vertically in the <token>transform</token> Designer can be done in two ways:

trans-unit.source: Scroll the mouse wheel
trans-unit.target: Scroll the mouse wheel

trans-unit.source: Using the Up and Down arrow keys
trans-unit.target: Using the Up and Down arrow keys

trans-unit.source: Scrolling horizontally in the <token>transform</token> Designer can be done in two ways:
trans-unit.target: Scrolling horizontally in the <token>transform</token> Designer can be done in two ways:

trans-unit.source: Hold down the SHIFT key + scroll the mouse wheel
trans-unit.target: Hold down the SHIFT key + scroll the mouse wheel

trans-unit.source: Using the Left and Right arrow keys
trans-unit.target: Using the Left and Right arrow keys

trans-unit.source: Drawing Surface
trans-unit.target: Drawing Surface

trans-unit.source: The drawing surface in the <token>transform</token> Designer has a default size of 200*200 cells.
trans-unit.target: The drawing surface in the <token>transform</token> Designer has a default size of 200*200 cells.

trans-unit.source: To modify the size:
trans-unit.target: To modify the size:

trans-unit.source: Go to the <legacyBold>Tools</legacyBold> menu and select <legacyBold>Options</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: Go to the <legacyBold>Tools</legacyBold> menu and select <legacyBold>Options</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: Expand <legacyBold><token>transform</token>s Designer</legacyBold> and click <legacyBold>General</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: Expand <legacyBold><token>transform</token>s Designer</legacyBold> and click <legacyBold>General</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: Modify the <legacyBold>Number of Grid Cells on the X axis of the Grid Surface</legacyBold> and the <legacyBold>Number of Grid Cells on the Y axis of the Grid Surface</legacyBold> values.
trans-unit.target: Modify the <legacyBold>Number of Grid Cells on the X axis of the Grid Surface</legacyBold> and the <legacyBold>Number of Grid Cells on the Y axis of the Grid Surface</legacyBold> values.

trans-unit.source: Values range from 100 to 1000.
trans-unit.target: Values range from 100 to 1000.

trans-unit.source: Click <embeddedLabel>OK</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Click <embeddedLabel>OK</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Page
trans-unit.target: Page

trans-unit.source: Pages can be added, deleted and renamed within the <token>transform</token> design surface.
trans-unit.target: Pages can be added, deleted and renamed within the <token>transform</token> design surface.

trans-unit.source: <token>mapop</token>s and their scope containers are per page.
trans-unit.target: <token>mapop</token>s and their scope containers are per page.

trans-unit.source: To add, remove, or rename a page, right-click the <legacyBold>Page 1</legacyBold> tab at the bottom of the design surface to view the available options.
trans-unit.target: To add, remove, or rename a page, right-click the <legacyBold>Page 1</legacyBold> tab at the bottom of the design surface to view the available options.

trans-unit.source: More Map Stuff
trans-unit.target: More Map Stuff
